1.0.name: wordpress/mediashort
1.0.description:
Adds a custom url rewrite to media files and expose these in the Media Library in WP-Admin. You can set your own unique tag-url to the media files and the MediaShort will listen to the ID of the image and redirect your visitors to the real url for the specific media file.

Please use Twitter @ekandreas for contact regarding this plugin!
